name: FIGHT FIGHTERS
description:
FIGHT FIGHTERS

99% by me

Player 1: WASD to move, F and G to attack

Player 2: Arrow keys to move, comma and period to attack

Space for hitboxes

There are neutral, crouching, and aerial versions of both attacks, making for six total attacks.

↓ + → + Punch = Hadouken (when facing right)

↑ + ↑ + ↓ + ↓ + ← + → + ← + → + Punch + Kick = Heal
